title: nAraNanai nidam kaNamEnum
sahitya:
nAraNanai nidam kaNamEnum ninai manamE


anupallavi

  siriyavan abhayam ena verikoL erittadan pOl narasimhanAgi un nizhalpOl aruL tanda


caraNam    jnyAnam kAttu nangai mAnam kAttu nADi vanda vAnara kulam kAttu
mAri kAttu muniyOr yAgam kAttu marai kAttu emarkku nal vazhi kATTum tiru
